A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The entire movie frustrated me as it was terrible writing\, weird visually\, stupid humor and to me didn't feel a thing like Star Wars.

The writer just thought it would be cool to throw in a bunch of twists and turns just for the "shock" factor and apparently forgot the story along the way.

I actually liked some of the new characters from The Force Awakens. After seeing this I have no vested interest in their story any longer and could care less what happens to them in Episode 9.
